scripts.build:esm: mkdir -p dist/esm && tsc -p tsconfig.json && echo '{"type":"module"}' > dist/esm/package.json
scripts.build:cjs: mkdir -p dist/cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.arethetypeswrong: yarn build && yarn pack && yarn dlx @arethetypeswrong/cli package.tgz
